** Vlad was just about to answer Havoc when a strange bot suddenly ran up, 
watching as both him and Havoc exchanged words.
But then a smile turns his lips as he hears the tale of the battle at the 
Maximal Base, wondering just what hope those weaklings had which made them 
keep fighting.
And since Von had disappeared with Megatron and a crew of Maximals many 
years ago, and if the Maximals were still fighting like they were, then they 
must have some just reason to not have been taken over and destroyed by now.
Vlad crossed his arms and leaned back onto one leg, looking at Havoc and 
considering his offer for a moment. The animal at his side getting up and 
moving a bit in excitement. She could sense it. Finally he sighed as he saw 
Havoc begin to run down the hall, simply shrugging and following close 
behind.
If he was correct, this was an island�and water didn�t exactly agree with 
him.
Shesta padded at his heels.**

� This is an island, right? In need you or one of your team members to get 
me to mainland then.�

** There was no point in asking nicely; he had always been told to order or 
take what he wanted. And to get into the battle and see if he could slag a 
few Maximals while scouting for Von sounded good to him.**
